response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe holds significant value for those who appreciate its unique features and benefits. Considering its quality and the effort put into its creation, I propose a price of $150 for this exceptional item. This offer reflects not only the cost of production but also the time and expertise invested in making it truly special. I look forward to your consideration and hope you find this product worthy of your investment.", "product_price": 150}
